original_text: a messenger came to Saul, saying, “Hurry and come, for the Philistines have made a raid against the land.”
korean_text: 전령이 사울에게 와서 이르되 급히 오소서 블레셋 사람들이 땅을 침노하나이다

sentences.original_text: a messenger came to Saul, saying
for the Philistines have made a raid against the land.
sentences.korean_translation: 블레셋 사람들이 그 땅을 급습했기 때문입니다.
